snippet.title: Direct Feed: Baseball | Epoch Cassette Vision [1981]
snippet.description:
Direct feed video capture footage of Baseball for Epoch Cassette Vision. This game was designed for two people to play, but I played it alone. Sorry about that. Recorded directly from original hardware (with S-video mod by Christa Lee of Sound Retro Co.) and upscaled to 720p via xRGB Framemeister.

You may use this unwatermarked footage for your own video projects. All I ask is that you please provide a source credit either in your video or its description. Thanks!
